description:
A short, small puzzle-box.

You have five days until your deadline. Write or die.

CAST:

E - By which you may INTERACT with various objects.

W,A,S,D - With whom you may PROPEL our protagonist along the XY plane.

RIGHT MOUSE - Employed in many places, employ his services when you feel the need to TOUCH or REACH.

ESC - Through which you may LEAVE.
